short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A basic example extension with only required keys

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows you to quickly an conveniently copy selected data columns from office tools, namely Google Sheets, and then convert that information into into a SQL formatted list for things like an 'IN' statement.
